Example Test Plan.doc
Click the headings in the table of contents to learn about them. Click the More Info icon to download a sample test plan document.
Section 1. This section is an introduction describing the purpose of the tests and types of tests to be run.
Section 2. This section contains a list of equipment to use in the test. This includes cables, optional components, and software.

Section 3. This section contains a topology diagram for how the equipment is to be connected. This is the network as it is to be built. If the topology duplicates a section of the actual network, the section has a reference. Device configurations are in the Appendix.

Section 4. This section includes information about the test itself:
  • The goal of the test
  • The information testers are seeking
  • The time estimate for test completion
Section 5. This section included the step-by-step test procedures.
Section 6. This section includes the anticipated results and success criteria. This can include specific criteria such as ping times not exceeding 100 ms.
Section 7. This section contains the results of the test and the conclusions from the results.
Section 8. The appendix contains configurations or other relevant information. The other relevant information could include modifications, log files, or command outputs.
